title: A TED speaker's worst nightmare
description: Colin Robertson had 3 minutes on the TED stage to tell the world about his solar-powered crowdsourced health care solution. And then...
text: Today I'm going to talk about unexpected discoveries. Now I work in the solar technology industry. And my small startup is looking to force ourselves into the environment by paying attention to ... ... paying attention to crowd-sourcing. It's just a quick video of what we do. Huh. Hang on a moment. It might take a moment to load. (Laughter) We'll just -- we can just skip -- I'll just skip through the video instead ... (Laughter) No. (Laughter) (Laughter) (Music) This is not ... (Laughter) Okay. (Laughter) Solar technology is ... Oh, that's all my time? Okay. Thank you very much. (Applause)
